Joanna Edith Hines

  1. Alternate Birth Name: Hine
  2. Foster Name: Julia
  3. Foster Family: Hypolt and Louisa Brown Elsen
  4. Location of Family: Humphrey, NE
  5. Sending Organization: n/a
  6. Arrival Place: Unknown
  7. Age on Arrival: 2
  8. Date of Birth: 1914, NY
  9. Gender: female
  10. Married Name: Julia Foreman
  11. Spouse Name: Francis Foreman
  12. Source: Forget Me Not: The Fermanski / Foreman / Forman Family website; 1920 United States Federal Census; 1930 United States Federal Census; OTE, 218; National Orphan Train Complex.
